name: Sacred Burger
description:
In Sacred Burger, you play as a bottom burger bun and your mission is to slice some ingredients to create a crazy burger!

Every time you play, the gods, through King Bun, give you a new recipe to follow and a time limit. 

Each win makes you gain score, and the more score you have, the less time you have to accomplish new recipes.

How high will you go?

The music for the game is available as well here:



Controls : 

Mouse/Keyboard : WASD - Move / Left Click - Attack

Controller : Left stick - Move / X button - Attack
